header.author: Hieronymus David Gaubius
header.title: A complete extemporaneous dispensatory; or, the method of prescribing, compounding, and exhibiting extemporaneous medicines: In which is contained at large, The Doctrine of all those Various Forms, both External and Internal, which are now in Use; Exemplified with Many Accurate Specimens of Each. Translated from the Latin original of the learned Dr. H. D. Gaubius, Present Professor of Physic and Chemistry in the University of Leyden.
